# Discord Chat Analysis for üíª‚îÇdevelopers Channel

## 1. Summary
The discussion primarily revolves around Hyperfy development topics, with a focus on technical aspects of the platform. Key points include:

- Discussion about wallet connect changes causing potential deprecation issues
- Exploration of IPFS/Arweave integration for storing NFT metadata and world folders
- Conversation about hyps (Hyperfy applications) development, with mentions of porting existing v1 apps to the hyp format
- Clarification that Ash is the primary developer working on the Hyperfy engine
- Interest in expanding VR controls beyond basic "action" functionality, with suggestions for raycasting from player bones to UI elements in-world
- Backend development challenges, including Python caching issues and asset management systems
- Brief mention of potential vehicle functionality coming to the platform

The chat demonstrates a collaborative environment where developers share ideas, troubleshoot issues, and discuss potential improvements to the Hyperfy platform.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Does anyone know if there is a .hyp in all .hyps that uses world.get(key) and world.set(key, value)? (asked by Gert-Jan Akerboom) A: Yeah ummm the portal app iirc. It uses it to store the teleport position. (answered by Ashxn)
Q: Is there some kind of open "hyps we want" board? (asked by hiroP) A: Yeah there is a board of hyps you simply gotta look at v1 again and scroll through the available apps. (answered by ·≤º~/^b0gie-(.*)$/)
Q: Anyone digging into more controls in vr rn? Maybe we can join forces and move beyond just 'action' in vr? Some raycasting from player bones to ui in world? Resonite/neos style? (asked by 0mka) A: Unanswered

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: Ashxn | Helpee: Gert-Jan Akerboom | Context: Looking for examples of world.get(key) and world.set(key, value) usage in hyps | Resolution: Ashxn pointed to the portal app which uses these functions to store teleport positions
Helper: ·≤º~/^b0gie-(.*)$/ | Helpee: hiroP | Context: Looking for information about what hyps to build | Resolution: Suggested looking at v1 apps as reference and mentioned examples in 'awesome-hyps' that have ported apps like 'portal' and 'zone'
Helper: 0mka | Helpee: General chat | Context: Speculation about wallet connect issues | Resolution: Suggested it's likely due to wallet connect changing to reown and some things being deprecated/changed

## 4. Action Items
Technical: Explore VR controls beyond basic 'action' functionality, including raycasting from player bones to UI | Mentioned By: 0mka
Technical: Test potential workaround for VR interaction issues | Mentioned By: ·≤º~/^b0gie-(.*)$/
Technical: Develop more functional and reusable hyps similar to v1 app library | Mentioned By: ·≤º~/^b0gie-(.*)$/
Feature: Implement streaming world folders from IPFS or Arweave | Mentioned By: ·≤º~/^b0gie-(.*)$/
Feature: Add vehicle functionality to the platform | Mentioned By: ~/drdoge.eth

# Discord Chat Analysis

## 1. Summary
The chat primarily revolves around discussions about Hyperfy's technical capabilities and limitations. A key technical question was raised about displaying webpages in Hyperfy worlds, with clarification that v2 doesn't yet support webviews, though screensharing is available as a workaround. There was mention that iframe/webview functionality might be added to core/nodes in the future. A user noted that the screen.hyp shares video but not audio. The conversation also touched on Project89, which was built on Hyperfy, and included discussions about marketing strategies and community building. Some users expressed frustration about token prices and marketing approaches, while others emphasized the importance of building and contributing rather than focusing solely on token value.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Do we have a app that is a screen in the world can show a designated webpage? (asked by Coinexpert) A: nope no webview in v2 yet. but you can use screenshare and show a tab or a stream (answered by 0mka)
Q: Is there a screensharing .hyp yet? (asked by hiroP) A: https://discord.com/channels/958209073277456457/1346623562462527649/1361324085598228530 this one might suffice (answered by 0mka)
Q: i found this screen.hyp only share video, but no audio, is that made by purpose or a bug? (asked by Coinexpert) A: Unanswered
Q: why project89 mega pump? (asked by cloudAI) A: two completely different projects that do different things. Not sure how you would compare them. I think you're only looking at price and that's why you're confused. (answered by Shiffty)
Q: Why does infrastructure built on Hyperfy have a lower market cap? (asked by cloudAI) A: Unanswered

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: 0mka | Helpee: Coinexpert | Context: Needed a way to display webpages in Hyperfy | Resolution: Explained that webview isn't available in v2 yet but suggested using screenshare as a workaround
Helper: 0mka | Helpee: hiroP | Context: Looking for screensharing functionality | Resolution: Provided a link to an existing resource and mentioned limitations (can't interact with it like a site from in-world)
Helper: Parzival | Helpee: cloudAI | Context: Confusion about Project89 vs Hyperfy | Resolution: Explained that Project89 is an established AI project that's showcasing Hyperfy tech through their partnership

## 4. Action Items
Type: Technical | Description: Add iframe/webview functionality to core/nodes | Mentioned By: 0mka
Type: Technical | Description: Fix audio in screen.hyp which currently only shares video | Mentioned By: Coinexpert
Type: Technical | Description: Create a new hyp for screensharing functionality | Mentioned By: hiroP
Type: Documentation | Description: Write documentation for existing features | Mentioned By: hiroP
Type: Feature | Description: Implement webview support in v2 | Mentioned By: Ashxn

# Analysis of Discord Chat in ü™ô‚îÇhyper Channel

## 1. Summary
This chat segment contains minimal technical discussion. The conversation primarily revolves around the Hyperfy project's longevity and financial runway. A user (jingo) expresses concern about the token being down 99%+ and inquires about the project's runway. Agent12 responds by highlighting that "World Owners" have been using Hyperfy without airdrops for nearly 4 years, suggesting the project has community support despite token performance. Ashxn, likely a team member, confirms they have runway for "a few years" but indicates this will change upon launch. The conversation lacks specific technical details, implementations, or problem-solving discussions.

## 2. FAQ
Q: How much runway do you have? (asked by jingo) A: Right now we're good for a few years but this will change when we launch üöÄ (answered by Ashxn)

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: Agent12 | Helpee: jingo | Context: Question about project sustainability despite token performance | Resolution: Explained that "World Owners" have been using Hyperfy without airdrops for nearly 4 years, suggesting community support

## 4. Action Items
Feature: Project launch mentioned as upcoming | Description: Launch that will change the runway situation | Mentioned By: Ashxn
